Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

Controller is the "brain" of each taxi and is the class that removes and adds taxis to the system Enables dispatcher Controller contains the location list which determines the locations of each taxi

Constructor Detail

Controller

public Controller()
Method Detail

update

public Location update(Location ol,
                       Location l,
                       int id)
A syncronized method that calls the following private methods based on the incomming parameters: removeLocation(int id), romoveLocation(ol), and getLocation(ol,l) The method is called by removeTaxi(int id) or TaxiThread

Parameters:
ol - -Current location of a taxi. ol is always null when during removeLocation(id)
l - -Location a taxi requests to move to. l is always null during removeLocation(ol).
id - -Taxi id number. Used when removing a location with a specific id.
Returns:
-Returns the location a taxi moved to (if getLocation). Returns null on all removes

hasCabs

public boolean hasCabs()
Called by dispatcher to determine if there are active cabs in the system.

Returns:
-Returns false if the cabs list is empty. Otherwise returns true.

removeTaxi

public void removeTaxi(int id)
Removes a specific taxi from system.

Parameters:
id - -id of taxi to be romoved.

addTaxi

public boolean addTaxi(int id)
Adds taxi (id number) to system

Parameters:
id - -id of taxi to be added
Returns:
Returns true if taxi is successfully added. Otherwise false

taxiExists

public boolean taxiExists(int id)
prevents multiple taxis from being assigned to the same patrol area by checking to see if the patrol area was regestered.

Parameters:
id - - Patrol area of taxi.

setIPAddress

public void setIPAddress(java.lang.String address,
                         int id)
Logs the IP address of a newly regstered taxi. the IP is used by dispatcher to communicate with a specific taxi.

Parameters:
address - IP address to be logged.
id - Taxi id.

getIPAddress

public java.lang.String getIPAddress(int id)
Returns IP address of a specific taxi Used only by dispatcher.

Parameters:
id - Id of taxi.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Activated when controller starts. Listens to the network for incoming taxis. Regesters new taxis. Starts dispatcher.

Parameters:
args - Unused.
